casebody.data:
In the Matter of Sierra Club et al., Respondents, v Village of Painted Post et al., Appellants, and Wellsboro and Corning Railroad, LLC, Respondent. [987 NYS2d 590] Present — Scudder, EJ., Centra, Peradotto, Lindley and Whalen, JJ.

Motion for reargument or leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied.
